## Type of Change

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [contributing guidelines](../docs/contributing.md)
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have added tests for my changes (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated the OpenAPI spec (if API changes)
- [ ] I have run `make lint` and fixed any issues
- [ ] I have run `make test` and all tests pass

## API Changes

<!-- If you've modified the API, check these: -->

- [ ] OpenAPI spec updated (`apps/api/api/openapi.yaml`)
- [ ] API client regenerated (`make generate-api`)
- [ ] Documentation updated
